HARMONY IN CHAOS



#1
A 0
B 3
C 5
D 7

#2
A + A 1

#3
B + B 1

#4
C + C 1

#5
D + D 1

#6

#7

#8

#M
PROB 20: CV 1 N.B RRAND 0 A
PROB 30: CV 2 N.B RRAND 1 B
PROB 50: CV 3 N.B RRAND 2 C
PROB 70: CV 4 N.B RRAND 3 D

#I
M 1000
N.B 0 -5

#P
